darshanaya wishaya yatathe kalaya ha awakashaya , wishwa sambhawa widyawa , rasayana widyawa, bhauthika widyawa saha aindriya lokaya washayen swabhawaye darshanaya gana kerena sakachchawa eetath wada kapipenena lakshanayaki. 1876 wanawitath engals awurudu atak ma swabhawika widyawan gambaurin hadara ‘swabhawaye apohakaya’ liwima aarambhakara thibu athara durin wirodhaya liwimedi ema nawa danuma pa්rayojanawath lesa yodagena atha.
